channel.title: Tmux on Pablo Lopez
channel.description: Recent content in Tmux on Pablo Lopez

item.title: Using Neovim with tmux
item.description: I’ve been using NeoVim for the past few months. I’ve always been a VSCode user, but then someone in my team suggested that VSCode is shit compared to IntelliJ Idea Ultimate. I then started using IntelliJ for a month or two with the VIM extension. At one point, I was starting to learn IntelliJ shortcuts to try and use the mouse less and less, and then I realised that I’d rather use an open source tool like NeoVIM rather than learning a bunch of shortcuts from a vendor tool.
